name: Klean Kanteen Kid Classic Sippy Cap
description: A great alternative to aluminum or plastic, the Kid Kanteen Sippy Cup is made of food-grade stainless steel with a chip-resistant finish to help it stand up to being dropped or knocked. A spill-proof sippy cap won't make a mess when it tips over.Klean Coat™ chip-resistant, powder coat finish is more durable than ever. Using the chemical hazard assessment known as GreenSceen®, Klean Kanteen developed a formulation that is safer for people and the planet.Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel holds up to abuse.Spill-proof sippy cap has a removeable valve that is easy to clean.
